Owl
This is simple single-player game created using frontend development tools. The main goal of this progect is to gain practical developer skills. Practice is the only way to realize how programming actually works.
Skip →
Gameplay
You have to play as Owl character defeating enemies. There are 8 levels in this game. To complite a level you have to solve simple tasks choosing the right answer in time.
Tasks
Tasks appear every 5 seconds. Spheres with different answers will be shown next. Just click the sphere which contains the right answer as you suppose.
Damage
Each right answer allows you to wound the enemy depending on the Owl's damage, and wrong answer allows the enemy to do the same. The end of time is a wrong answer. The tasks appear until the Owl or enemy's health points are zero.
Coins
If the level is successfully complited you will get several coins. Otherwise you will lose 15% of your current coins. You can spend these coins to buy some artefacts if you need it.
Artefacts
There are 3 types of artefacts: health increase, damage increase and timer bonus. All current statistic you can see in the Statistic section.
Let's play
Here we go. Try it and enjoy the game.
